info.description:
izuna from izuna the legend of the unemplyed ninja gains weight in many different ways you can make her gain weight anyway you like but there are some rules that you have to follow

1.no gore
2.no killing of the main character
3.no nudity(her clothes can ripp off but her bra and underwear grows with her)
4.language is ok but keep it mild

and also here is what izuna looks like incase if you have never played the game before http://media.photobucket.com/image/izuna/jargongames/izuna.jpg?o=5
